segments.text: Hello there . Is there anything I can help you with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , please . 70,000 US dollars is being transferred into our account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which company are you from ? I'll check your details .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm the accountant with Go Thong Computers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah , yes . Mr Can , isn't it ? Yes , the money has been transferred successfully . But you'll need to change it into RIB before you can have it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . Can I withdraw all of it now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have an account with us , right ? If so , there shouldn't be any problem .
segments.speaker: S1
